predefinedObjectQueries.name: asn
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find the autonomous systems and owner organizations of IP addresses mentioned in this report.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: related
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find other reports that mention indicators from this report.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: context
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find other information related to the indicators mentioned in this report (might give large result set).

predefinedObjectQueries.name: incidents
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find incidents related to network indicators in this report.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: tools
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find tools related to the hashes mentioned in this report.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: reports
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find reports that mention IP addresses from this autonomous system.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: tools
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find tools with observed network traffic to this autonomous system.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: asn
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find the autonomous system and owner organization of this IP address.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: tools
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find tools related to this indicator.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: incidents
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find incidents related to this indicator.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: unattributed
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find techniques that are not known to be used by any threat actors or implemented by any tools.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: asn
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find the autonomous system and owner organization of network indicators related to this tool.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: incidents
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find incidents with network indicators related to this tool.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: network
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find network indicators related to this tool.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: threat actors
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find threat actors known to use this tool.

predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find reports that mention either the name of this tool or hashes classified as this tool.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: tools
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find tools used by this threat actor.

predefinedObjectQueries.name: techniques
predefinedObjectQueries.description: Find techniques used by this threat actor.
